Reviews.Title: great camera!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Really easy to use and a nice size. Fits in my hands really well. I love the purple color too. It has a lot of features, but is not too complicated. Very easy to upload to the computer.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Linda Schmidt "Cross Stitcher"
Reviews.Content: This is my first digital camera.  I was terribly afraid it would be quite complicated and hard to figure out.  It does come with what seemed to me to be a very big instruction book, but much of the camera's operation seems quite user-friendly and intuitive.  I was able to start taking pictures right away, and am pleased with how they have turned out.  Highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera at an awesome price!
Reviews.Author: Lindsey H.
Reviews.Content: This camera is my first Pentax, and so far it's been great.  Super easy to learn, loads of settings and features, and a stellar macro.  I'd definitely recommend it to a friend or family member.

Reviews.Title: Buena camara
Reviews.Author: dostonos
Reviews.Content: Muchas opciones en el menu, buena imagenes, modelo comodo. Es de bateria recargable, a funcionado perfectamente. el costo es aceptable.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Dana Kurylo
Reviews.Content: We purchased this camera for our daughter to take on a trip to South Africa. Great picture quality and long battery life. This camera is well worth considering, not only for the price, but for the photo quality. The camera was easy to set up and some memorable photos were only a click away!

Reviews.Title: Pentax Optio Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: bkmb
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my daughter.  She loves it!  She has had several cameras but she says this one is the best.  It is very easy to use and the pictures are very sharp and the color is exact.

Reviews.Title: Does not work!
Reviews.Author: gary goodwin
Reviews.Content: Pictures come out fuzzy/unclear or way to dark.  Never had an issue with this on any other camera.  The company refuses return after 30 days, which I was hoping after taking pictures at 3 important events that I could work out this glitch. Nope!

Reviews.Title: Pics do not come out well.
Reviews.Author: Shell
Reviews.Content: Most pictures come out fuzzy, and others come out dark, you have to take the pic 3 times and you might get a brighter shot.  Company wouldnt help out on refund, only a week after the whole 1 month ran out.  Never will order from them again.

ProductInfo.Features:
10x wide angle zoom lens (28-280mm); 14.1-megapixel CCD sensor
2.7-inch LCD screen; Pentax sensor shift Shake Reduction (SR) stabilization system
Widescreen 720p HD video at 30 frames per second
Automatic shooting modes including Pentax Auto Picture
Capture images and video to SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Pentax Optio RZ10 14 MP Digital Camera with 10x Optical Zoom with CCD Shift Stabilization and 2.7-Inch LCD (Violet)
